metadata.title: CVE-2021-47336 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:smackfs: restrict bytes count in smk_set_cipso()Oops, I failed to update subject line.From 07571157c91b98ce1a4aa70967531e64b78e8346 Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001Date: Mon, 12 Apr 2021 22:25:06 +0900Subject: [PATCH] smackfs: restrict bytes count in smk_set_cipso()Commit 7ef4c19d245f3dc2 ("smackfs: restrict bytes count in smackfs writefunctions") missed that count > SMK_CIPSOMAX check applies to onlyformat == SMK_FIXED24_FMT case.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
